Prop.Name: Lock
Prop.Description: True to initially render this column as locked.

Prop.Name: Resizable
Prop.Description: False to disable column resizing. Defaults to true.

Prop.Name: Sortable
Prop.Description: True if sorting is to be allowed on this column.

Prop.Name: Hidden
Prop.Description: True to initially render the column hidden.

Prop.Name: Hideable
Prop.Description: Specify as false to prevent the user from hiding this column (defaults to true).

Prop.Name: MenuDisabled
Prop.Description: True to disable the column menu. Defaults to false.

Prop.Name: AutoExpand
Prop.Description: True if this column should expand to fill unused space in the grid.
